subject: Dear Beloved,
body:
Dear Beloved,
Greetings to you ,I am Mrs. Dorothea Ahner,a CITIZEN of Germany, 78
years Old. a widow suffering from a long time cancer of the breast
with only few months to live according my Doctors, I inherited my late
husband's wealth after his death because during the period of our
marriage we couldn't produce any child, so I have decided to divide
this wealth to churches and good men and women in order to use the
fund and help the less privileged.
I selected you to be in charge of this Dream Project after learning
about your love for humanity, and I am willing to donate the sum of
$38 million to you to start my Dream Project for the less privileged
since I cannot handle the Project my self because of my poor health
condition.
So upon your reply I will instruct the BANK IN BANGKOK THAILAND where
this fund is to open online account on your behalf. Please confirm
these below items if you are interested in this Dream Project with my
$38 million donation:
1, Your full name
2, Your contact address
3, Your telephone
I wait for your kind reply.
Please send your full name and telephone address to my email:
(
mrsdorotheaahnerxx@gmail.com
)
Thank you for your help
Mrs. Dorothea Ahner
Email: 
mrsdorotheaahnerxx@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Mrs. Dorothea Ahner,

I'm deeply touched by your story and your desire to help the less privileged. It's truly inspiring to see such generosity, especially in difficult times like these.

However, I must admit that I'm a bit confused about some details of this Dream Project you mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on what exactly this project is about? What kind of help do the less privileged need and how can this donation be used to provide it?

Also, could you tell me more about how you found out about my love for humanity? I'm just curious because I don't remember sharing such information publicly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Travis
